title: a simple yet easy way to make arram fun for all
body: is to enable all champs even if you don't have them

why no? it makes it fair for all
No it doesnt. If someone doesnt own said champion, they dont play said champion, thus meaning theyre at a disadvantage. There is no discernible benefit to this change and only negatives.

current system puts people who don't make accounts specifically for aram at a disadvantage

ARAM accounts are overblown and a near non-issue. Theres already over auto unlocked champs in aram as of this patch, and even before then ARAM accounts would get sorted by MMR such that theyd be fighting themselves. People complain everything is an aram account just because they rolled lux or ziggs or xerath regardless. Fact is people dodge games where they get crap rolls or reroll bad picks so good picks show up more often. Aram only accounts are near non existent in the mode.
